title: Massaman curry

ingredients.name: coconut milk
ingredients.description: Mixed with the same amount of water

methods: Add the massaman curry paste to a pan, stir until fragrant. Mix the coconut milk and water together
Add half of the coconut milk, stir until well combined, bring to a boil.
Add the roasted peanuts and bay leaves, then add the meat, boil until the meat is cooked and tender.
Pour in the remaining coconut milk. Reduce the heat and add a pinch of salt, the fish sauce and palm sugar and stir until dissolved.
Add the potatoes and onions, increase the heat and add the tomatoes, boiling for about 1 minute.
Turn off the heat, serve in a bowl with rice.
